example: All employees must abide by the company's code of conduct.

example: The board voted to abolish the outdated overtime policy.

example: Three board members chose to abstain from the important vote.

example: The new strategy will accelerate growth in the Asian market.

example: Her advocacy for employee wellness programs gained strong company-wide support.

example: An agile approach allows the team to respond quickly to changes.

example: The ambiguity in the contract led to a dispute between parties.

example: New hires need time to assimilate into the company's work culture.

example: Users must authenticate their identity before accessing confidential files.

example: Management addressed concerns regarding the bandwidth at the annual conference.
